Thank you for a great 2014

2014 has truly been a great year. We’ve launched a new marketing site, welcomed new team members and continued to build the dashboard you’ve asked for. We’ve had a few ups and downs, but ultimately we’ve learnt invaluable lessons that have allowed us to sharpen our focus and improve both our product and the overall customer experience.

Before we get ready to take on 2015, we’d like to thank all our customers for their never ending support and feedback. Without you, we wouldn’t be able to do any of this, so from the bottom of our hearts: Thank you.

A special thanks to those who have stopped by for coffee, written about us, emailed, tweeted and all of the good stuff. We could never fully express our appreciation for the supportive community that surrounds us, but below is a shout out to some of you.

##Special thanks to

import.io, Duedil, Xola, Rise and Bunny Inc who let us invade their offices to shoot customer testimonials.

Our case study participants: Shoreditch Grind, New Zealand Post, NIU Sushi, Motley Fool, PowerLinx, NimbleUser, BoxCast, Tabush Group, Kigu.me, vzaar, shoto, Gold Star, Saasu and BetterNow.

Our guest writers: Lauren deLisa Coleman, Janessa Lantz at RJMetrics, Shannon Byrne at mention, David White at import.io, Trevor Parsons at Logentries, Lean Analytics author Alistair Croll and Peter Meyers at Moz.

Our partners: import.io, mention, General Assembly and Growthhackers

Those who wrote about us: import.io, The Future of Data; brightpod, How Startup Marketers Stay Productive; Daniel Streefkerk, Dashboarding Spiceworks with PowerShell; Inc., 6 Software Applications that Will Make Startup Life Easier

Our tweeters:

A big thanks to @geckoboard for giving us the shirt off their back and being a part of our growth. Model: @calvinfab pic.twitter.com/8iGyS02dO9

— Envoc (@envoc) October 6, 2014

Wir bereiten gerade unseren PR-Launch vor und erfreuen uns des neuen @Geckoboard Dashboards auf dem TV :) pic.twitter.com/JFcUntWgi3

— teamgrid (@teamgridapp) October 8, 2014

how we use @geckoboard here at @rise, brilliantly narrated by @thainsimon . https://t.co/VbYvn7a6v8

— Suneel Gupta (@suneel) November 17, 2014

We have a cool new projected dashboard in the office @geckoboard pic.twitter.com/pXAMOHClzD

— bidlogix (@bidlogix) November 11, 2014


And of course, let’s not forget our investors: Alexander Bruehl, Christoph Janz, 500 Startups, Index Ventures, DN Capital, Ryan Holmes, Dave Morin and John Hunt.

And the rest of you that have made this year one to remember.

Thank you for helping us build a stronger product…

For putting food on our table…

And for allowing us to let loose every now and then.

Last but not least, after 2 years of faithful service, Mr White got promoted to VP of Barketing. The world is now a better place.

We can’t wait to see what 2015 brings. See you in the new year.

Paul Joyce
Founder and CEO
